rows: number of modes of activity $j, j=1, \ldots, N$
number of available units of renewable resource $k, k=1, \ldots, K$
duration of activity $j$ performed in mode $m$ under the scenario $\xi, j=1, \ldots$,
starting time of activity $j$ under the scenario $\xi, \xi \in \Xi$
completion time of activity $j$ under the scenario $\xi, \xi \in \Xi$
amount of the resource $k$ occupied by the activity $j$ in mode $m$
set of all predecessors of activity $j$
set of available modes for activity $j$
number of immediate successors of activity $j$
